articles.author: Ozzie Mejia
articles.title: EU commission will investigate Microsoft/Activision acquisition - Shacknews
articles.description: A European Union commission will investigate the pending acquisition of Activision Blizzard, citing concerns over sales of non-Windows PCs.
articles.content: The preliminary investigation suggests that Microsoft may have the ability, as well as a potential economic incentive, to engage in foreclosure strategies vis-à-vis Microsoft's rival distributors of … [+1630 chars]
